bean.name: DurationRoutePolicyFactory
bean.title: Duration Route Policy Factory
bean.description: RoutePolicyFactory which executes for a duration and then triggers an action. This can be used to stop a set of routes after they have processed a number of messages, or has been running for N seconds.

fromRouteId.description: Route pattern to select a set of routes (by their route id). By default all routes are selected

maxSeconds.description: Maximum seconds Camel is running before the action is triggered

maxMessages.description: Maximum number of messages to process before the action is triggered
